de.fu.weave
Interface OutputConverter

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractOutputConverter, JSON, LaTeX, Plain, XSLFO
public interface OutputConverter

A pluggable Output-Module for the Weave-controllers. Weave-controllers can generate output of various types. Native types are "xml" (raw output), "xhtml", "xml" and "xsl" (xml and xsl are basically the same thing, but xsl includes a stylesheet-PI; as are xhtml and html, but html is not valid XHTML for backwards compatibility). Using a custom output-module a weave-controller may be enhanced with further output-modules.

Since:
Iteration4

getCharacterEncoding

String getCharacterEncoding()
Gets the character encoding that the output is converted to.

Returns:
null if no Character-Encoding-Information should be sent. The charset as a String otherwise (e.g. UTF-8).

isAppliedAfterNativeTemplate

boolean isAppliedAfterNativeTemplate()
Check whether the Controller should transform the source-document using the currently executed actions native template prior to applying the output-conversion. If this returns false, the Controller will pass raw XML-date to the converter, otherwise it will pass the already preprocessed data which has been generated by applying the actions template before. In other words: If this method returns false, you will receive raw xml data, otherwise XHTML which has been obtained by applying the template which is annotated via Action.

Returns:
Since:
Iteration4
